code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[data,setData]=useState({});const[location,setLocation]=useState('');const url="https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=".concat(location,"&units=metric&appid=895284fb2d2c50a520ea537456963d9c");const searchLocation=event=>{if(event.key==='Enter'){axios.get(url).then(response=>{setData(response.data);console.log(response.data);});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:location,onChange:event=>setLocation(event.target.value),onKeyDown:searchLocation,placeholder:"Enter Location",type:"text"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"location",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"temp",children:data.main?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[data.main.temp.toFixed(),"\xB0C"]}):null}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"description",children:data.weather?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.weather[0].main}):null})]}),data.name!==undefined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bottom",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feels",children:[data.main?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"bold",children:[data.main.feels_like.toFixed(),"\xB0C"]}):null,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Feels Like"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"humidity",children:[data.main?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"bold",children:[data.main.humidity,"%"]}):null,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Humidity"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wind",children:[data.wind?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"bold",children:[data.wind.speed.toFixed()," MPH"]}):null,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Wind Speed"})]})]})]})]});}export default App;
